properties.media:imagetext:
S. HAUSER CO.
REAL ESTATE
68 POST STREET
SAN FRANCISCO
November Fifth,
Nineteen Twenty-six.
Mr. Joseph Phillips,
c/o Board of Supervisors,
City Hall,
San Francisco, California.
Dear Ir. Phillips:
As to the Shilling lands which
are located
back
of their Salt Works near
San Bruno and running east
to
tide water, will say that I can lease the City four
hundred acres of any portion of this tract of 1800
acres that may be selected for a term of twenty-five
with an option to purchase at some agreed
price for the land and also an agreed figure for
This can be decided on by the Committee and
the owners when you become interested in selecting a
location out of the tract.
The place will make a
very fine aviation depot for the reason that it has
a very good highway through the property and the air
currents are very fine and there will be no trouble
with any
cable or wire propositions to bother the
ships fron
entering on the ground.
You can submit this proposition to the
Board for their investigation.
they become interested
then I would be glad to give any further data concerning
the same.
Hoping that you will be able to make a selec-
tion out of this tract,
Yours very truly,

Yours very truly,
